listing.listing_description:
Flowering vines shade the pavilion, cacti stand in the courtyard, and palms reach fronds toward the open-sided indoor pool at this gleaming modern villa in a garden outside Marrakech. Verdant landscaping and plenty of potted plants are touches of nature amid clean-lined modern decor. The lush setting feels like a private estate, but it’s a 7-minute walk from Royal Golf Marrakech and Golf Amelkis.

Find sun and shade in equal measure by the outdoor swimming pool and a pergola-covered pavilion with a barbecue and dining table. A spa area and indoor swimming pool make it easy to unwind after a day of sightseeing or golf, while a projector invites you to host a family movie night.

A wall of windows brings the garden into the living rooms, as do potted ferns. The look is pared-down luxury: jewel-toned rugs and mod sofas strewn with velvet cushions. The formal dining room seats 12, but for a quick coffee or snack, take a perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

A holiday at this vacation rental puts you a 7-minute walk from historic Royal Golf Marrakech, where you can tee off in the shadow of the Atlas Mountains, and Golf Amelkis, one of the most challenging courses in Morocco. Drive into the city center to explore the bustling medina, bargaining for leather bags and rugs, or to contemplate the tranquil Majorelle Garden.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Exclusive Penthouse on Top Floor of the One and Only in Cape Town. This property is truly only for VVIP Guests who want ultimate security and privacy, while also giving them access to all areas of the hotel including the pool, the spa, and the gym. Our VS' get requests for this type of product and we do not have anything similar on offer in this region.

Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

listing.listing_description:
This superb luxury villa is part of the Royal Fairmont Palm Resort on the famed Route Amizmiz outside Marrkech. Accommodations for ten are divided between a three-bedroom main house and a two-bedroom guest cottage, while the expansive private grounds and cool, elegant interiors form an ideal venue for entertaining guests or savoring private time with loved-ones. Your vacation rental includes access to the amenities at the Fairmont Royal Palm, including its outstanding golf course, while complimentary staff include a cook, security guard, and maid service.

Cloistered within high pisé walls in classic Moroccan style, the villa's estate features an ample swimming pool set amid lush lawns, olive trees, and lovely modernist sculptures. Bask in the sun on chaises longues, plunge into the refreshing water, and relish cool drinks in the pavilion. Sip afternoon tea or cocktails in the lounge near the house, and enjoy your lunch alfresco at the twelve-person table on the veranda.

Sliding glass doors create a lovely flow of space and air between the pool terrace and interiors. The spacious home is beautifully decorated with fine artwork and elegant yet comfortable furnishings. Savor a bottle of wine in one of the salons before gathering at the table for eight in the dining room. Enjoy downtime in the library, and treat yourself to a soothing session in the massage room. 

All five bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and access to terraces or gardens. The main house includes two bedroom suites with king beds and one suite with a queen bed, while the guest cottage includes a queen suite and a king suite. Both of the villa's queen beds can be arranged as two singles, and the queen suite in the guest cottage includes a lovely alfresco shower.

Within the grounds of the renowned Fairmont Royal Palm, you'll enjoy extraordinary sport, spa, and family amenities as well as one of the finest golf courses in Morocco. The villa is also within very easy reach of Marrakech and the historic Medina quarter, as well as several other outstanding golf courses. Marrakech-Menara Airport is just fourteen kilometers away, making Villa Agar a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Gaze upon the endless city and ocean views at this chic apartment on the coast of Cape Town. Swim to the end of the balcony’s infinity pool and feel like you’re out in the middle of the ocean. On the opposite end, the sunken lounge is the perfect spot to get a lay of the land while you sip your morning coffee. For a closer look, head down to Camps Bay Beach or downtown for a late breakfast.

Sleek angles not only grant scenic view opportunities but add a unique feel to the layout of this open-concept suite. Follow wood flooring through the contemporary living room. Sink into plush designer furnishings while you check out the view from the corner window. Let the chef’s kitchen inspire your inner chef, maybe even try your hand at a local delicacy like a gatsby or bunny chow.

Pick your favorite sun lounger on the balcony and work on that vacation tan, unless you’d rather stick inside to keep cool in the air conditioning. If there’s any lingering work to take care of, the office space will provide the secluded atmosphere to get it out of the way. At dinner, the apartment has formal and alfresco settings with incredible views. And, there’s a gym, spa, and wine gallery in the hotel.

Grab your camera and your hiking boots and head 8 minutes to Lion’s Head; you’ll probably recognize it from all the postcards. The climb to the top takes about 90 minutes, and at the top, you’ll be rewarded with the best view in the city. After, take the kids to Two Oceans Aquarium and meet some of South Africa’s native sea creatures. At night, wander Long Street, and you’re guaranteed to find your new favorite bar.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The sea seems close enough to spill into the pool at high tide at this glassed-in, art-filled beach house on Camps Bay. Though this sleek, gallery-like villa is backed by the Cape Town mountains, it’s kept luminous by walls of windows overlooking the ocean. It’s less than a 10-minute drive to both the beach and the Twelve Apostles.

Trust the villa’s butler and housekeeper to make your holiday comfortable, whether it’s advising on the South African wine to serve with dinner or helping you heat up the barbecue. Spend days swimming in and lounging by the pool, and if you’ve gone out surfing or hiking, follow it up with a stretch in the private gym and a session in the sauna.

What feels like acres of glass, framed in black steel, keeps the focus on the ocean views. A fireplace and plenty of seating create an inviting vibe in the open-concept living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. Look for colorful modern art and ornate sculptures both here and throughout this vacation rental.

The home’s 5 bedrooms include 1 with a kitchenette and 1 guest apartment: an ideal setup for bigger groups of family or friends who want to explore on their own.

And there’s lots to explore, from the trails running around the Twelve Apostles (of which there are actually 18) to the cable car up Table Mountain. Drive 7 minutes to Camps Bay Beach for a swim or a cocktail at one of its chic oceanfront spots.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Les Palmiers is a superb luxury villa on the Route Amizmiz of Morocco, just outside the heart of Marrakech. Nestled on an expansive estate, the villa comprises a four-bedroom main house and a three-bedroom guesthouse, providing ample accommodations for family reunions, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. Exquisite outdoor and indoor living areas are enhanced by excellent amenities for relaxation and play, including a large swimming pool, Hammam steam bath, fitness center, and ping-pong table, while the professional staff includes a villa manager and private cook.

The lush, 7000-square-meter estate invites you to dreamy days and evenings under the Moroccan sky. An ample veranda extending from the main house features an alfresco dining table and lounge, while a second table and lounge are located on the far side of the pool. Elegant chaises longues frame the sparkling water, and the expansive lawns set an enchanting scene for special ceremonies, receptions, or games in the open air.

Wide glass doors open from the pool terrace and veranda to the living and dining rooms, creating a seamless, indoor/outdoor space. A gorgeous dining room with seating for ten adjoins the alfresco veranda, forming a single dining area for large parties. The cavernous living room features breathtaking ceilings, sumptuous velvet sofas, and a wood-burning fireplace for cooler evenings. A separate media room is perfect for cozy downtime and movie nights. Your private cook has a fully equipped kitchen that includes a Nespresso machine, and there is a Sonos sound system both inside the home and on the terrace.

The main house features four large king suites, all with ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys its own lounge area and opens to a terrace, while the three guest suites have furnished private terraces. The separate guesthouse has two king suites and a smaller guest suite with a pair of twin-size beds—forming a perfect private abode for a family.

Les Palmiers gives you extraordinary serenity and privacy while placing you within easy reach of world-class golf and the rich cultural splendors of historic Marrakech. Drive about twenty or twenty-five kilometers to reach Ryads Al Maaden Médina & Golf Resort, the old Medina quarter, the Majorelle Garden, and Marrakech-Menara Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Wake up each day to lush green hills tumbling to the sea under the Mediterranean sun at Villa Palo Alto. Cool and contemporary, the villa sits imposingly on a hill near Marbella and the beach overlooking the sea. Four bedrooms and bright minimalist interiors let you enjoy the Costa del Sol in style.

The villa’s traditional tiled roof extends over a sleek terrace with lounge and dining areas and views of the sea. One of the property’s pools stretches out between two wings of the house; the other is located indoors and has an inset hot tub. You can either work up a sweat in the villa’s gym or in the sauna and Turkish bath, and at the end of a day of sightseeing or sunbathing, retreat to the media room.

White walls, two-story windows edged in dark metal and a flat gray fireplace surround give the great room at Villa Palo Alto a modern, open-air feel. Far from being austere, though, the space is enlivened by a tufted sofa, geometric vases, oversized pendants and woven plum-colored dining chairs. For your convenience, the home has a fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Palo Alto has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. There are two bedrooms on the ground floor and two upstairs; the second-floor bedrooms have dressing areas as well. Parties needing more space can use the apartment, which has a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, living room and kitchenette.

Located in one of the most exclusive gated communities in southern Spain, Villa Palo Alto provides you with access to private golf and tennis courses, a horseback riding club, and a heliport. Though the villa makes you feel surrounded by lawn, hills, sky and sea, it’s actually just a 15 km drive from Puerto Banus Beach, an 11 km drive from San Pedro Alcantara and a 21 km drive from Plaza de los Naranjos. Spend an afternoon at Nikki Beach, a 35 km drive away, or take a day trip to Malaga, 81 km away, or Gibraltar, 74 km away. The most convenient airport is in Malaga and is 72 km away.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

listing.listing_description:
Host incredible parties at this stylish villa overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and the 12 Apostles Mountain Range in Cape Town. Mingle on the balcony as the fire pit warms the air, extending the evening on cooler nights. The wet bar is the perfect place to let your inner mixologist run wild. The next morning, wake up to the sounds of the sea; Clifton and Camps Bay beaches are both just 3 minutes away. 

A house doesn’t have to be a box, and Luxus is the proof. The V-shape of the ocean-facing patio opens both interior and exterior spaces to even more of Cape Town’s dramatic landscape. Blending indoor and outdoor areas creates an enhanced social environment, utilizing all that Luxus has to offer. Custom designed furniture and state of the art electronics complete modern-contemporary decor. 

Belt out your favorite tunes on the karaoke system, hop in the pool for a late-night swim, or keep it casual and hang out at the bar. On quieter nights, do some reading by the fire or watch a movie with the kids. You’ll be able to keep up with your fitness routine in the home gym if you want. And, the house comes with an elevator, full air conditioning, and housekeeping/butler service. 

You’ve got an amazing view of the ocean, but how about shooting some pictures of the whole city? Venture up Lion’s Head, the city’s most prominent natural feature, to see the best view in the country. The hike takes about 90 minutes, and there’s a small cafe at the top. Make your descent, then head to V&A Waterfront, Cape Town’s entertainment hub, for dinner, drinks, and dancing. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hope House is Cape Town’s ideal, secluded retreat. It’s just a few minutes from the world class amenities of South Africa’s most prized coastal city, but once you’re on the property, you’d never know it. Originally built in the twenties, Hope House has an authenticity that is impossible to duplicate. With six gorgeous en-suite bedrooms, this private vacation rental is perfect for a large family, a group of friends, or a small corporate retreat.

Perched amongst the foothills of Cape Town’s Table Mountain, this ancient colonial home has been updated to the highest standards of modern luxury without losing any of its historic roots. The palm trees, integrated indoor/outdoor spaces, and island inspired colour scheme are exactly what you’d expect from such a tropical, breezy environment. Inside, there’s elegant chandeliers, custom designed furniture, marble countertops, and amazing brick, wood, and stone accents. The main living room opens on to the terrace, which is decorated with comfortable furniture as well, so the line between inside and out gets delightfully blurry. The main kitchen is a chef’s dream, loaded with high-end stainless steel appliances, there’s a second fully equipped kitchen as well with more of a low-key vibe, perfect for a quick meal.

Keeping busy won’t be a problem at Hope House, with table tennis, an exercise room, conservatory, office, steam room, and wine cellar, you’re sure to find somewhere fun to enjoy your time. Outside on the terrace there’s a swimming pool and hot tub, as well as plenty of sun loungers and outdoor furniture, great for soaking up the afternoon sun. And, housekeeping is included.

For nearby beach access, visit Camps Bay Beach and Clifton Beach, both are about twelve minutes away and feature plenty of beachfront bars, restaurants, and shops. Clifton is slightly more popular among tourists and may be a bit busier than Camps Bay. In Cape Town, make sure to visit the Victoria & Alfred Waterfront, still a functioning harbour with over four hundred retail outlets, dining, and the Two Oceans Aquarium.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
An arched portico and double doors lead the way to a marble foyer at this coolly elegant Marbella home in view of the sea. Shaded and sunny outdoor living areas serve up water vistas, while sliding glass walls flood the interiors with light. From this palm-lined enclave it’s less than 10 minutes to Playa de Nagueles in the city’s Golden Mile, home to a Michelin-starred restaurant plus a beach.

 Get into a good book in a lounger by the swimming pool and hot tub, taking breaks to cool off or have a drink from the outdoor wet bar. Face off against friends and family across the ping-pong table, toss market finds on the barbecue, serve tapas at the al-fresco dining table, and stay out after sunset around the firepit. This vacation rental also features a home theater with a projector, indoor mini-bar, private gym, and Wi-Fi.

 Black metal frames the villa’s sliding glass walls for a hit of contemporary edge that’s echoed by a sleek black fireplace in the living room. A massive wooden doorway leads to a dining room with slipcovered seating for eight, and the fully equipped kitchen is a high-contrast pairing of wood and white cabinets against glossy black countertops.

 This luxury property has one honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, hot tub, and a balcony with a partial ocean view. The other three bedrooms have queen beds; one has ocean views and the other two overlook the gardens. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

 The villa is a 9-minute drive from the Golden Mile of Spain’s Costa del Sol. While Playa de Nagueles does have a beach, it also has a hotel that was once the home of a prince, a legendary tennis club, a Michelin-starred restaurant, and a number of yachts you can reserve for the day. If it’s not a holiday without a round or two, there are four golf courses nearby where you can tee off.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With enticing views of the range and fairway, Villa Nature is a secluded villa located a thirty minute drive from Marbella. At half that distance, San Pedro Alcantara is the nearest town. The villa is situated within a gated resort with private security, two Golf courses, Club House, restaurant and private meeting areas. If your family and friends are just looking for peace and quiet in pastoral Spain, we recommend this exquisite vacation rental rising like an ivory sculpture amid its lush green surroundings. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

Enjoy a refreshing splash in the pristine L-shaped, infinity-edge swimming pool. Or perhaps a soothing soak in the bubbles of the outdoor hot tub? The majestic grounds also feature perks perfect for the consummate entertainer including a wet bar, barbeque and heat lamps. Inside, you will find a wine fridge, television, sound system, another wet bar and an impressive media room with overhead projection. Have a workout in the fitness area and then take some time to forget about everything in the heat of the sauna.

The palatial interiors of Villa Nature feature the finest furnishings and finishes. Enter from a dramatic vestibule and relax on one of the plush couches in the living area with a large flat screen television and scenic views. From here, the fully equipped kitchen provides a large center island with breakfast bar. The formal dining area with its large floor-to-ceiling windows as well as the adjacent alfresco dining set offer the most dramatic mountain vistas. Your reservation includes housekeeping.

Five exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and a sofa bed can accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. Of the three suites with queen beds, two have bidets and one provides a kitchenette, a desk and a lounge – perfect for a couple still on honeymoon or any guests requiring more privacy. The fourth bedroom includes a king size bed, bidet, walk-in closet, dressing area and terrace and the fifth comes with two twins and ensuite bathroom.

Located in one of the most exclusive areas in southern Spain, Villa Mirador provides you with access to private golf and tennis courses, a horseback riding club, and a heliport, all while being located just a short drive from the coast. If you feel like having a beach day, Playa Puerto Banús is just ten miles away from Villa Nature. Nikki Beach and Marbella Beach, in the 30-40 km range, also make great options for a day of sand, sun and sea breeze. Villa Nature has been conceived as a holiday experience that combines the amenities of a boutique hotel with the benefits of a sequestered private villa in the hills, so you may just spend most of your days meandering about this dream residence, or playing golf nearby.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Serout Jenna is a beautiful luxury villa in the Palmeraie oasis near central Marrakech. Set on 900 square meters of estate amid lush palm groves, aged olive trees, and fragrant rose gardens, the villa offers the privacy of an enchanted garden within minutes of some of the finest cultural attractions, cuisine, and golf in Morocco. Expansive outdoor areas, elegant interiors adorned with extraordinary contemporary art, and fine staff including a private cook create an ideal setting for special reunions with family and friends.

The neoclassical villa features a colonnaded veranda gazing out on the ample swimming pool and expansive gardens. Enjoy fresh mornings and warm afternoons bathing in the cool water and luxuriating on elegant loungers in the shade of parasols. Repair to the gazebo amid olive trees for afternoon cocktails, and gather on the veranda for alfresco lunches and soothing digestifs.

Indoors, kindle a fire in the living salon and savor a fine wine before dinner; then gather in the beautiful dining room with twelve seats of burgundy velvet, dreamy medallion chandeliers, and arched doors to garden. The décor is exquisite throughout, with high, coffered ceilings, elegant furnishings, and outstanding examples of contemporary artwork from the owner's personal collection. The villa also features a massage room and traditional Hammam, as well as a library for work, study, or contemplative downtime.

Each of the bedroom suites features a sumptuous queen bed and spacious ensuite bathroom. Each is designed with extraordinary care and taste to possess its own distinct character, with fabulous fabrics, rich color palettes, and tastefully bold artwork. There are three suites in the main house and three in the stand-alone guesthouse with private entrance. In the guest house, two of the suites open to the pool terrace.

From the cloistered private oasis of Serout Jenna, you're less than nine kilometers to the historic heart of Marrkech, and minutes from world-class golf. Proximity to Marrakech-Menara Airport makes Serout Jenna an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Incredibly private, yet close to downtown Marrakesh, world-renowned golf, and historical sites, Dar Pili has it all. Perfect for hosting large family events, destination weddings, and corporate retreats, Dar Pili features seven king en-suites, all with access to the private garden, and an impressive staff consisting of housekeepers, cooks, maids, and butlers. The spacious garden estate makes group gatherings easy and comfortable, and smaller sitting areas are perfect when you need to break off for more intimate moments. With its authentic Moroccan style villa, Dar Pili is the perfect vacation rental for your next amazing Luxury Retreats vacation.

Decorated with indigenous flora and mature palm trees, Dar Pili’s gorgeous estate captures the natural beauty of Morocco with ease. The red house design is a modern interpretation of ancient Moroccan architecture found in the surrounding villages towards the mountains. Inside, designer furniture, high-end electronics, and eclectic pieces of art from the Souks decorate Dar Pili’s spacious interior.

Da pili, although traditional in its roots, has many state of the art features that most vacation villas in the area do not. Inside, the exercise room, cinema, spa, and hammam add an extra touch of entertainment for you and your guests. Outside, two swimming pool, lush gardens, and alfresco dining set the tone for lavish outdoor living. Dar Pili’s most notable feature is its stable with seven horses and trainers on staff. And, there’s a private tennis court with a spectators area as well.

Within fifteen kilometers of Dar Pili’s lush estate, you’ll have access to Atlas, Ryads Al Maaden Medina, and Marrakech Palmeraie golf courses. When you’re ready to experience the vibrant and bustling atmosphere of the downtown core, jump right into the heart of it all at the Medina. Perhaps Marrakech’s most famous tourist area, the Medina is the main town square, constantly buzzing with street performers, musicians, local cuisine, and tourist excursion opportunities. Right beside the Medina, you’ll find The Souks, Marrakech’s most famous market, and shopping center.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Obsidian is a spectacular coastal villa in the prestigious oceanfront suburbs of Cape Town, minutes from Clifton and Camps Bay. The towering, five-story architectural masterwork enjoys some of the finest views on the West Cape, encompassing a vast stretch of the Atlantic Ocean and the iconic peaks of Lion's Head and the Twelve Apostles. With superbly appointed interior and exterior living areas on every floor (including multiple kitchens and dining rooms), a museum-worthy modern art collection, and a talented private staff, this vacation rental is perfectly suited for family reunions or large groups of friends celebrating special occasions.

The villa's fourth floor features the main living area: a luminous great room opening seamlessly to a lofty terrace with infinity pool. A fully equipped kitchen, high-end grill, and bar-style kitchen island serve the lounge and dining areas. The central salon is ideal for admiring the breathtaking sunset, while a fireplace warms your nighttime gatherings over bottles of South African wine.

The third floor boasts another TV lounge, a dining table, a kitchenette, and a balcony accompanying three of the guest bedrooms. The second floor features a wonderful alfresco cooking and dining area, including a classic braai grill, and the first floor includes yet another lounge and dining table with full-service kitchen. The entrance lobby is on the ground floor, with a security gate, parking for five cars, and an elevator servicing all floors.

The stunning master suite is perched on the top floor of the home, with sweeping vistas from its bedroom, bathroom, and private balcony. A fireplace and in-room bath accompany the king bed, while the ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity, two walk-in showers, and two toilets. All four of the guest suites feature queen beds and ensuite bathrooms, and two enjoy balconies. These superb accommodations with plentiful living/dining areas form an ideal haven for destination wedding guests.

Obsidian provides an unparalleled combination of contemporary artistry, exquisite privacy, majestic natural beauty, and easy access to some of the top attractions near Cape Town. Drive minutes to the beautiful beaches and posh towns of Camps Bay and Clifton, or visit the fabulous Victoria & Alfred Waterfront. Cape Town Airport is just twenty-five kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From its elevated seaside perch, Villa Splendour enjoys incredible ocean and city views. With no expense spared, this ultra-luxurious five-bedroom is ideal for hosting family, friends, colleagues, and loved ones on vacation, or for a special event. Splendour’s five-car garage, elevator, and extremely spacious lounge areas were made to entertain, and they do so in the most stylish fashion. Nearby, you’ll find the downtown areas of Clifton and Cape Town, as well as the gorgeous beachfront areas of each city, Clifton Beach being the closest at just one kilometer.

Splendour’s monochromatic decor is the perfect contrast to the vibrant greens and blues of Clifton’s gorgeous natural environment. Designed with clean, straight lines and modern-contemporary ideals, this villa takes beach vacation luxury to new heights. Custom designer furniture, high-end electronics, and eclectic works of art are thoughtfully placed throughout spacious common areas. And, the living room fully opens to the terrace, inviting fresh air and sunlight to flow freely through the entire villa.

When it’s time for dinner, Splendour has beautiful settings inside and on the terrace. There’s also a bar inside, and an included chef service to help make sure you’ve got lots of time to enjoy your night, rather than working away in the kitchen. Inevitably, the party will spill out on to the ocean-view terrace where you’ll find the infinity swimming pool, alfresco showers, sun loungers, and outdoor living areas. Back inside, Splendour is equipped with television, a gas fireplace, an office, and Wi-Fi.

Nearby beaches, Clifton and Camps Bay, are both conveniently close to Splendour, and both feature pristine white sand, calm waters, and vibrant beach town surroundings. You won’t have any trouble finding a local restaurant for dinner or cocktails; there are plenty lining the street just before the beaches. Clifton and Cape Town are also both great for tourist excursions, with activities like guided hikes through the heights of the Table Mountains to deep sea diving. And, there’s a wide range of shopping nearby as well.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover an oasis just minutes from Marrakech at Villa Sidi. With six bedrooms and a great location in view of the Atlas Mountains, this beautifully appointed vacation rental makes it easy for you and up to twelve friends or family members to explore the city, visit the dunes or simply relax. A full staff is ready to pamper you, and an eco-friendly heating system means your holiday is green.

Your stay at Villa Sidi includes the services of a private chef, villa manager, housekeeper and security staff. Take in the mountain views from sun-splashed outdoor living areas with a pool, barbecue and whimsical artwork. Inside, you’ll find amenities such as a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi, as well as a provided smartphone.

This luxury property pairs traditional Moroccan pieces with clean-lined modern architecture in its bright, open-concept living areas. Two sitting areas—one sunken, one raised—are separated by a sleek fireplace, and the adjacent dining area can seat all twelve guests in a room flooded with light by floor-to-ceiling windows. While there is a fully equipped kitchen at the villa, it’s for staff use only.

The villa has five bedrooms with queen beds, many of which open to the pool terrace or have their own lounge areas, and one bedroom with two twin beds and its own terrace. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and, like the main living areas, a gorgeous mix of traditional rugs, vibrant colors and modern furnishings.

The property’s location on the Route de Sidi Abdallah Ghiat means you can use it as a tranquil honeymoon from everyday life or as a base to explore. Set aside at least one day to visit both the bustling Jema el-Fna and the quiet Majorelle Gardens in central Marrakech. Avid golfers will want to book a tee time at the nearby Ryads al Maaden resort course, and visitors seeking sun can take a day trip to the beaches in the port city of Agadir.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Savor the Moroccan sun in this palatial, four-bedroom villa in the high-end Route Amizmiz district near the heart of Marrakesh. Expansive alfresco living spaces, elegant and cool interiors, and four superb bedroom suites create an ideal habit for family reunions and special occasions with friends

While the Fairmont Royal Palm is an incredible destination in itself, its location on the Route Amizmiz puts you within day-trip distance of central Marrakech. Spend a morning wandering the World Heritage–designated medina and browsing the souks, or an afternoon strolling the Majorelle Garden or visiting the recently opened Yves Saint Laurent Museum.

listing.listing_description:
Lanterns cast a glow on the red walls and brick courtyard of this traditionally inspired retreat outside Marrakech. With 20 bedrooms and a full staff, the villa feels like your own boutique hotel, filled with both classic Moroccan rugs and streamlined modern furnishings. See how the setting inspired great works of fashion at the Yves Saint Laurent Museum, 30 minutes away, and the Majorelle Garden.

 Sip a local spiced coffee or mint tea on the loungers and sun beds in the courtyard, cool off in the swimming pool, and serve drinks from the al-fresco wet bar along with whatever the chef prepares on the barbecue. As the stars come out over the city, climb up to the rooftop terrace, unwind in the library and hammam inside, set the mood with the integrated sound system, and share holiday snaps via Wi-Fi.

 Terracotta-hued walls and carved doors lead to spacious living rooms filled with a combination of modern pieces—tempting daybeds, zebra-print rugs, angular sofas—and artwork depicting traditional scenes. The fully equipped kitchen is for staff use only, but the dining area can seat parties of up to 40 friends and family members traveling together.

 Each of the 20 bedrooms at this luxury hideaway is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, private en-suite bathroom, and a fireplace. Many of the bedrooms also have their own lounge areas and open directly to the terrace, so you can fall asleep to the sound of palm fronds whispering in the breeze and feel it on your face in the mornings.

 This vacation rental is a 30-minute drive from the Yves Saint Laurent Museum, where you can draw inspiration from more than 1,000 works from the fashion designer’s studio, and the Majorelle Garden, the oasis whose signature blue walls sparked his creativity. Give yourself an afternoon to get lost in the medina, wandering alleyways to hidden courtyards.

 Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spread over twenty-thousand square meters of lush gardens, this three-villa estate acts more like a boutique hotel. With accommodations for twenty-six, and a staff consisting of housekeepers, private cooks, a chauffeur, the Ezzahra Estate is the perfect host for a special event like a wedding, family reunion, or retreat. Located in the exclusive Palmeraie area of Marrakech, the Ezzahra Estate’s private property is just minutes from the Medina, the Atlas Mountain range, and so much more.

Combining Villas Ezzahra, Azzaytouna, and Alkhozama, your large group will have an endless supply of amenities, and space. The gardens are decorated with ancient olive trees, date palms, pomegranate and orange trees. Architecturally, Ezzahra shows off its traditional elements, red clay, intricate detailing, and free-flowing open-air spaces that unify the indoor and outdoor areas. Inside, authentic Moroccan decor will inspire you. With so many different areas to explore, there’s always more to discover. The ornate native art, colorful design, and vibrant spirit of Morocco will excite you and your guests throughout your entire stay.

With a staff of seventeen, laundry, meals, chauffeured trips through Marrakech, and anything else you may need are easily taken care of, allowing you and your guests to live worry free, focusing on the rejuvenating atmosphere of your Moroccan vacation. Outside on the terrace, you’ll love exploring the expertly manicured gardens, alfresco dining and living areas, fire pits, three-swimming pools, and grass tennis court. Inside, air conditioning, Wi-Fi, a media room, and exercise equipment will provide all the comforts of home.

Jump right into Moroccan culture with a visit to the Square of Djemaa El-Fna and The Souks for an exciting afternoon of street performance, shopping, and delicious local cuisine. After you’ve taken part in the hustle and bustle of downtown Marrakech, head to Dar Si Said Museum to see ancient Moroccan artifacts, and learn a little more about the city’s history. And, if you need an escape from the busy city streets, head for the Majorelle Gardens and stroll through their gorgeous property, rich with plants from across the globe.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The sublime Palais Chahar Mahal stands on two-and-a-half-acres of gorgeously landscaped estate outside Marrakech en route to the Ourika Valley. Enjoying panoramic views of the Atlas Mountains on the horizon, the spectacular grounds set the stage for alfresco enjoyment, while exquisite interiors and five fabulous bedroom suites accommodate eight guests in lavish comfort.

The enchanting estate features a meditative lake and fabulous swimming pool, the latter framed by an elegant deck and four lovely pavilions housing spa and fitness facilities. Savor dreamy hours exploring the villa's gardens of rose and bougainvillea, groves of palm and jacaranda, and orchards of luscious fruit trees. Play in the sparkling pool and treat yourself to a refreshing trip to the poolside Hammam or massage room. Sip cool drinks on elegant loungers and savor sunset cocktails on the upper-floor terrace. The vast lawns, ample lounge areas, and stately symmetry of the palace's grounds create an ideal setting for weddings and other special events.

Traditional arched windows open from the villa's spacious interiors, allowing the home to breath the scented air. Exquisite marble floors and columns, beautiful artwork and furnishings, and multiple fireplaces engender a warm and stylish ambiance with touches of Moroccan, Persian, and European grandeur. Enjoy cocktails in one of the parlors, delectable feasts in the dining room, and nighttime billiards games.

Each of the villa's bedroom suites possesses its own name, reflecting a unique character. Silver Jasmine is on the main floor and features a king bed, doors to the terrace, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and tub. The four remaining bedrooms—Velvet Camellia, Rose Powder, Sweet Almond, and Golden Purple—occupy the upper floor, and all enjoy fireplaces, deluxe ensuite bathrooms, and access to alfresco areas with beautiful views.

Beyond your private paradise, you're wonderfully situated for relishing the natural and cultural wonders of Morocco. The villa is roughly equidistant from the precious beauty of Ourika Valley in the Atlas Mountains and the architectural splendors of central Marrakech. Golfers will find themselves in heaven, with no fewer than ten outstanding golf courses within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel like royalty at the opulent Sab Palace. Set on nearly five acres of private grounds in La Palmeraie, this Marrakech vacation rental feels like a world of luxury unto itself, with extensive amenities, gorgeous architecture and decor, and twenty bedrooms. Reserve the property for a family reunion, to celebrate a milestone birthday or anniversary with friends, or host a destination wedding—and the honeymoon afterwards.

The grounds of the palace are studded with five swimming pools, from an expansive main pool to a lap pool, as well as plenty of loungers. A tennis court, exercise room, home theater, games area and a private spa make the property feel like your very own resort. To add to that feeling, daily breakfast is included in your stay.

Like many a historic palace, this one is a striking combination of the traditional and modern, with classic rugs and artwork alongside clean-lined contemporary furnishings. Multiple sitting and dining areas mean there’s plenty of room to gather and enjoy each other’s company or to find a quiet nook where you can catch up on reading. Though breakfast is included in your holiday, there is a fully equipped kitchen.

Sab Palace has eight senior suites with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and seven junior suites with en-suite bathrooms: six with king beds and one with two twin beds. Guest house Villa di Rosa has two bedrooms with king beds that share a bathroom, and Villa Blanche has one bedroom with a king bed and one with a queen bed, both with en-suite bathrooms. There are also deluxe bedrooms, with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and superior suites, with queen beds and shared bathrooms.

While the villa is located in a quiet and stylish area of Marrakech, it’s a short drive from must-see sights such as the city’s bustling medina and the exquisite Jardin Majorelle. Avid players will appreciate that it’s also within easy reach of the Amelkis golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
